events.message: I ordered a jacket two weeks ago and I want to return it because it does not fit me properly. How can I get a refund?
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request related to a return.
Assigning this refund case to agent Jessica for further processing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to return the jacket for a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 98237465. The jacket is brand new and still in the original packaging, never worn.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund once we receive the jacket back. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Great, I appreciate the quick response and help. Looking forward to receiving the return label.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you. Once we get the jacket returned, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped it yesterday and appreciate your follow-up. Thanks for your help with the refund process.
Your refund has been completed and should appear in your account within 2-3 business days. Thank you for your patience!
We value your feedback! A short survey has been sent to your email to rate your satisfaction with our refund process and support.
We are closing this case as resolved. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any other issues or questions.
